item.title: Unconventional AI confirms its massive $475M seed round
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: Led by Naveen Rao, the former head of AI at Databricks, the new hardware startup is valued at $4.5 billion.

item.title: Hinge CEO steps down to launch Overtone, an AI dating app
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description: Overtone is described as "an early-stage dating service focused on using AI and voice tools to help people connect in a more thoughtful and personal way."

item.title: Fal nabs $140M in fresh funding led by Sequoia, tripling valuation to $4.5B
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: The round, which was Fal’s third fundraise this year, also included a secondary sale for early investors, sources tell us.

item.title: Cashew Research is going after the $90B market research industry with AI
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description: Cashew Research uses AI to automate the market research process while still collecting real-world data from humans.

item.title: B Capital founding partner Kabir Narang leaves to launch new investment platform
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Kabir Narang is laying the groundwork for a new investment platform slated for 2026 that will focus on "compounding at the intersection of technology, AI, and global capital flows."

item.title: Why Cursor’s CEO believes OpenAI, Anthropic competition won’t crush his startup
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: After reaching $1 billion in annualized revenue, Anysphere CEO Michael Truell explained the features his company is focused on building out.

item.title: Boom Supersonic raises $300M to build natural gas turbines for Crusoe data centers
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description: Crusoe will pay Boom $1.25 billion for more than a gigawatt of generating capacity with deliveries of the turbines starting in 2027.

item.title: VSCO lays off 24 staff as its consumer business suffers
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: In an internal memo seen by TechCrunch, VSCO's CEO Eric Wittman said the company's consumer business had declined more than expected, and some of its new growth initiatives didn't yield the expected results.

item.title: Pebble’s founder introduces a $75 AI smart ring for recording brief notes with a press of a button
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Named for the finger where the ring is meant to be worn, the new $75 Index 01 ring is not meant to be a competitor to the always-on, always-listening AI devices, like the AI pendant Friend, but instead offers a way to record quick notes and reminders with a press of a button on the ring's side.

item.title: Empromptu raises $2M pre-seed to help enterprises build AI apps
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: Empromptu claims all a user has to do is tell the platform's AI chatbot what they want — like a new HTML or JavaScript app — and the AI will go ahead and build it.

item.title: SoftBank and Nvidia reportedly in talks to fund Skild AI at $14B, nearly tripling its value
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: Skild AI is developing a hardware-agnostic foundation model for robots that can be customized for various uses.

item.title: OpenAI says it’s turned off app suggestions that look like ads
item.dc:creator: Anthony Ha
item.description: While OpenAI continues to insist that there are currently no ads — or tests for advertising — live in ChatGPT, the company’s chief research officer also acknowledged that the company “fell short” with recent promotional messages.

item.title: Is it time to ‘refound’ your startup?
item.dc:creator: Anthony Ha
item.description: Sometimes, founding a startup just once isn’t enough. At least, that seems to be the case with companies like Airtable, Handshake, and Opendoor, which all announced in recent months that they are “refounding.”

item.title: Ex-Googler’s Yoodli triples valuation to $300M+ with AI built to assist, not replace, people
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Yoodli counts Google, Snowflake, and Databricks among its customers.

item.title: Sources: AI synthetic research startup Aaru raised a Series A at a $1B ‘headline’ valuation
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: The one-year-old startup, which does market research on simulated populations, had a multi-tier valuation round, sources tell TechCrunch.

item.title: AWS needs you to believe in AI agents
item.dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo
item.description: AWS announced a wave of new AI agent tools at re:Invent 2025, but can Amazon actually catch up to the AI leaders? While the cloud giant is betting big on enterprise AI with its third-gen chip and database discounts that got developers cheering, it’s still fighting to prove it can compete beyond infrastructure.  This week […]

item.title: This startup built a Fitbit for your brain to combat chronic stress
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: Forenza collaborated with data scientists and biomedical engineers to develop Awear, a small device worn behind the ear for continuous brainwave monitoring. The device transmits results to an app, which provides information about the wearer’s mood and offers AI-powered coaching advice for managing stress and improving emotional resilience.

item.title: Meta acquires AI device startup Limitless
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Limitless said it shares Meta's vision of bringing personal superintelligence to everyone.

item.title: Nothing wants your money, AWS wants your trust, and Spotify wants your data
item.dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo, Anthony Ha, Kirsten Korosec, Sean O'Kane
item.description: AWS announced a wave of new AI agent tools at re:Invent 2025, but can Amazon actually catch up to the AI leaders? While the cloud giant is betting big on enterprise AI with its third-gen chip and database discounts that got developers cheering, it’s still fighting to prove it can compete beyond infrastructure.  This week […]

item.title: New streaming channel launches to give viewers a peek into city council meetings
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: Hamlet TV is a way to help keep citizens informed of what's happening inside local governments.
